description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: the city of Frankfurt am Main with historical photographs from 1926; 'co-determination' for employees in West Germany; Oberhausen Peace Village, a rehabilitation centre for seriously injured children from war and disaster areas throughout the world; theatre in Berlin; a play-off between Spain and Yugoslavia to decide the last participant for the 1974 World Soccer Cup.
